1997 NBA Playoffs Summary

1996 Playoffs Summary 1998 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: Chicago Bulls

Finals MVP: Michael Jordan (32.3 / 7.0 / 6.0)


1997 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: Michael Jordan (590)

TRB: Karl Malone (228)

AST: John Stockton (191)

WS: Michael Jordan (3.9)
